title: Playful
text: Make it playful, lighthearted, and fun.

title: Flirty
text: Add a flirty and charming vibe, but keep it respectful.

title: Witty
text: Make it clever and witty, with a touch of humor.

title: Extra Naughty
text: Make it extra naughty, bold, and risqu√©, but avoid anything illegal or non-consensual.

title: Funnier
text: Make it much funnier than usual, use jokes or puns if possible.

title: Super Romantic
text: Make it super romantic, sweet, and heartfelt.

title: Sarcastic
text: Add a strong dose of sarcasm and playful teasing.

title: Meme Lord
text: Write it in the style of a meme lord, using meme references or internet humor.

title: Icebreaker
text: Make it a creative icebreaker that gets the conversation started.

title: Mysterious
text: Make it mysterious and intriguing, leaving them wanting to know more.

title: Compliment Bomb
text: Shower them with genuine, creative compliments in a fun way.
